title: Murder at the Holiday Park: Episode 154
description:
It was a busy weekend in Porthcawl as the holiday season was just starting to ramp up. Families and friends had arrived at the holiday park to relax and have fun. But not everybody, one man was agitated and had violence on his mind. The results were shocking.....

How can you support Connor's family?
